testcase.name: should call BluetoothGattCharacteristic.setValue() before calling BluetoothGatt.writeCharacteristic()
should not call BluetoothGattCharacteristic.setValue() with proper parts not longer than maxBatchSize[0]
should not call BluetoothGattCharacteristic.setValue() with proper parts not longer than maxBatchSize[1]
should not call BluetoothGattCharacteristic.setValue() with proper parts not longer than maxBatchSize[2]
should not call BluetoothGattCharacteristic.setValue() with proper parts not longer than maxBatchSize[3]
should not call BluetoothGattCharacteristic.setValue() with proper parts not longer than maxBatchSize[4]
asObservable() should not emit error when BluetoothGatt.writeCharacteristic() returns true every time
asObservable() should emit error when BluetoothGatt.writeCharacteristic() returns false at any time[0]
asObservable() should emit error when BluetoothGatt.writeCharacteristic() returns false at any time[1]
asObservable() should emit error when BluetoothGatt.writeCharacteristic() returns false at any time[2]
asObservable() should emit error when BluetoothGatt.onCharacteristicWrite() emits error at any time[0]
asObservable() should emit error when BluetoothGatt.onCharacteristicWrite() emits error at any time[1]
asObservable() should emit error when BluetoothGatt.onCharacteristicWrite() emits error at any time[2]
should not subscribe to RxBleGattCallback.onCharacteristicWrite() before run()
should complete part of the write if RxBleGattCallback.onCharacteristicWrite() will be called with proper characteristic
should attempt to write next batch after the previous has completed and has been acknowledged - no retry strategy
should not attempt to write next batch or rewrite after the previous has failed - no retry strategy
attempt to rewrite the failed batch if the strategy has emitted the LongWriteFailure - first batch
attempt to rewrite the failed batch if the strategy has emitted the LongWriteFailure - mid batch
attempt to rewrite the failed batch if the strategy has emitted the LongWriteFailure - last batch
attempt to rewrite the failed batch if the strategy has emitted the LongWriteFailure - last batch, uneven count
should release QueueReleaseInterface after successful write
should release QueueReleaseInterface when write failed to start[0]
should release QueueReleaseInterface when write failed to start[1]
should release QueueReleaseInterface when write failed to start[2]
should release QueueReleaseInterface when write failed[0]
should release QueueReleaseInterface when write failed[1]
should release QueueReleaseInterface when write failed[2]
should timeout if RxBleGattCallback.onCharacteristicWrite() won't trigger in 30 seconds[0]
should timeout if RxBleGattCallback.onCharacteristicWrite() won't trigger in 30 seconds[1]
should timeout if RxBleGattCallback.onCharacteristicWrite() won't trigger in 30 seconds[2]
should emit error if batchSizeProvider will provide value not greater than zero[0]
should emit error if batchSizeProvider will provide value not greater than zero[1]
should release queue after next batch if unsubscribed[0]
should release queue after next batch if unsubscribed[1]
